review: Product doesn't work (connects to WiFi, but keeps giving error messages that it "can't reach amazon.com". The support page is not helpful with just a bunch of FAQs, and there does not seem to be any real support.
author: Markus heilig

review: so happy when this was ready for shipping! It quickly became a favorite of my visiting 5 yo grandson, who became convinced that the wonders of the world resided in the fire stick, and not the cable! Easy even for a senior to set up and use.
author: Haggys "Haggy"

review: Absolutely fantastic.works wonderfully. An amazing array of things to watch. I love it.
author: Carol Ruthen

review: Omg this this is soooooooo easy to use. We do not have cable and use the Internet as the only source of TV and this works well for our needs. Pretty much plug and play
author: Elizabeth

review: The Fire TV Stick exceeded my expectations in every respect.  It is quick to install, easy to use, performs flawlessly and has all of my favorite apps already on it.  Most impressive, it is fast.  I have experienced little, if any, buffering while using it.  What a time-saver that is!
author: CMG1960
